title: [1.13]版本中，命令方块怎么附魔？
author: asd2623

replies.author: SPGoding
asd2623
replies.txt_content:
SPGoding 发表于 2018-8-25 16:31
give @p minecraft:trident{Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:respiration",lvl:5s},Unbreakable:1b}

什么文 ...
破天荒的成功了，非常3Q，就是装备名称的颜色呀

replies.author: SPGoding
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 SPGoding 于 2018-8-26 10:13 编辑 
asd2623 发表于 2018-8-25 17:48
破天荒的成功了，非常3Q，就是装备名称的颜色呀
用 display.Name 的 color
give @p minecraft:trident{Enchantments:[{id:"minecraft:respiration",lvl:5s},Unbreakable:1b,display:{Name:"{\"text\":\"名字\",\"color\":\"red\"}"}}
